issue.title: Segmentation Fault when running gazebo 1.6.1 compiled from source

content.raw: Yes, but now I am using gazebo 1.5 compiled from source because I can't solve this issue. This error occurred at my job, so I gave up trying to make gazebo 1.6.1 work. You can close this ticket, because there are more recent versions of gazebo. I will try these ones.
content.html: Yes, but now I am using gazebo 1.5 compiled from source because I can't solve this issue. This error occurred at my job, so I gave up trying to make gazebo 1.6.1 work. You can close this ticket, because there are more recent versions of gazebo. I will try these ones.
